item.description: Silktrails: Cats in the Grove 2 is a cozy, hand-drawn adventure where you explore 11 peaceful levels and find over 1,000 hidden cats. Set in the charming world of Silkgrove, it's perfect for anyone who loves relaxing games and cute cats.
item.content:encoded:
